feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain showers this morning. Fog patches late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog. Amount 2 mm. Wind south 20 km/h. High 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
